uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand

Class HighscoreAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.HighscoreAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

    public class HighscoreAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Custom adapter to show a row of the highscore table
    Author:
    bourgein

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        Creates a View based on position in list. If the position is odd the background will be black else the background will be white
        Parameters:
        position - the position in the list
        convertView - the old view to reuse
        parent - the parent ViewGroup
        Returns:
        the View created
